name: Echo Hawk
overview: 2200 AD: For sixty years, aliens and humans have lived in peace and friendship. Only one dangerous race, the Mecanoidz, are still involved in war against Earth and alien bases. No diplomatic steps can convince the Mecanoidz to stop attacking our planet. Under strict secrecy, the Mecanoids build thier battleship the Meca Hawk. The Meca Hawk leaves planet Meca and attacks alien bases on Mars and Centauri. It must be stopped! Published in 64'er Top-Spiele #3, and in 64'er 1999/02.
